Package org.exist.xquery.util

Class Summary
DocUtils Utilities for XPath doc related functions
Error Class used to pass an error context to subordinate expressions.
ExpressionDumper  
HTTPUtils A place holder for static utility functions related to HTTP.
Messages Reads error messages from a ResourceBundle and provides shorthand methods to format the error message using the message arguments passed.
RegexTranslator This class translates XML Schema regex syntax into JDK 1.4 regex syntax.
URIUtils Utilities for URI related functions
 

Exception Summary
RegexTranslator.RegexSyntaxException Thrown when an syntactically incorrect regular expression is detected.
